A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just as soulless as episode 7\, but without the decency to pander to the audience. It spits at you\, teasing you for caring. Every serious moment is shattered by out-of-place and unfunny humor\, the plot falls to pieces under slight inspection\, and the characters barely progress. All setup from episode 7 is subverted to no end\, and we are left with little to anticipate for the next installment.\nThe shiny effects and flashing lights are pleasant enough.
